summary: A9913 is a new drug improving memory - like being there again. Anna joins 17 others testing it for $2000. Some experience the near future including deaths.
cast: Nathan Kress|Virginia Gardner|Kirby Bliss Blanton|Ryan Higa|Mark Furze|Ethan Peck|William Mapother|Mark Rolston|Marnie Alexenburg|Christopher Allen|Katie Booth|Shaun J. Brown|Daisun Cohn-Williams|Barry Habib|Julia Ling|Reiley McClendon|Mishel Prada|Wayne Alon Scott|Matthew Skomo|Pam Trotter
title: Tell Me How I Die
